title: Rider Protests, Foul Weather Clouds Mountainous 17th Stage of Giro d’Italia: ‘This Will be a Sh*t Show’
content:
Peloton votes 100 percent against Giro d'Italia organizer's decision to push on with storm-addled stage 17 in pre-ride chaos Tuesday morning.

Read the full article at Rider Protests, Foul Weather Clouds Mountainous 17th Stage of Giro d’Italia: ‘This Will be a Sh*t Show’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
